DOC.brief_summary: This study is designed to assess the effects of AZD 2624 in patients with schizophrenia
DOC.brief_title: Phase IIA Study in Patients With Schizophrenia
DOC.criteria: Females of nonchildbearing potential Diagnosis of Schizophrenia Clinically relevant disease and /or abnormalities. Alcohol or substance abuse not in remission Enrollment in another investigational study within 30 days
